titleStmt.title: The case of divorce and re-marriage thereupon discussed by a reverend prelate of the Church of England and a private of the Church of England and a private gentleman ; occasioned by the late act of Parliament for the divorce of the Lord Rosse.
titleStmt.author: Wolseley, Charles, Sir, 1630?-1714.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
